questions.question: What is the basic unit of digital information storage in a computer?
What does CPU stand for?
What is the purpose of an SSD (Solid State Drive) in a computer?

options.answer: To store and retrieve data quickly

questions.question: What does CPU cache do in a computer?

options.answer: Speeds up access to frequently used data
Keeps a log of user activities

questions.question: What is the function of an Ethernet port on a computer?

options.answer: To connect to a wireless network
To play audio and video files
To connect to the internet via a wired network
To provide a high-speed internet connection

questions.question: Which component of a computer is responsible for converting digital signals to analog signals and vice versa?
Which of the following programming languages is used for web development?
What does the acronym URL stand for in the context of the internet?
Which type of software allows you to browse the internet and view web pages?
What is the purpose of a firewall in computer security?

options.answer: To block unauthorized access and control network traffic
To connect to a wireless network

questions.question: Which file format is commonly used for digital images with lossless compression?
What is the role of a GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) in a computer?

options.answer: To display images and videos on the monitor
To speed up the boot-up process

questions.question: What is the purpose of a compiler in programming?

options.answer: To translate source code into machine code

questions.question: What is the cloud in the context of computing?

options.answer: A physical location where old computers are stored
A network of satellites in space
An online storage and computing service accessed via the internet
A group of computers connected by cables
A type of software for organizing files

questions.question: What is a LAN (Local Area Network)?

options.answer: A network that covers a large geographical area
A network that connects computers within a limited area, like a home or office

questions.question: What does HTML stand for in web development?
What is the purpose of an antivirus program?

options.answer: To display advertisements on the computer screen
To protect against physical damage to the computer
To remove viruses and malware from the computer
To increase the computer's processing speed

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of an open-source software?
What is the purpose of a DNS (Domain Name System) in networking?

options.answer: To convert IP addresses to domain names
To convert domain names to IP addresses
To store data in the cloud

questions.question: Which type of software is used for creating 3D models and animations?
What is the purpose of a VPN (Virtual Private Network) in computing?

options.answer: To simulate the behavior of hardware and run multiple operating systems on the same physical machine
To provide a secure internet connection and protect privacy

questions.question: What does the term 'algorithm' mean in computer science?

options.answer: A series of instructions that a computer can understand and execute
A computer virus that spreads quickly
A type of computer hardware component
A new computer language for advanced users
A set of rules for computer programming

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a cloud-based productivity suite?
What is the purpose of a graphics tablet in digital art and design?

options.answer: To display high-quality graphics on the screen
To improve the performance of the CPU
To provide an input device for artists to draw and create directly on the tablet surface

questions.question: What does the term 'metadata' refer to in the context of digital files?

options.answer: Data that provides information about other data
A set of mathematical operations for data encryption
A type of video file format
Data that is not relevant to the file

questions.question: Which of the following is a data storage unit that is larger than a terabyte?
